text: sabake sab tumhaare paravaradigaar ke saamane kataar pe qataar pesh kie jaengen aur (us vakt ham yaad dilaenge ki jis tarah hamane tumako pahalee baar paida kiya tha (usee tarah) tum logon ko (aakhir) hamaare paas aana pada magar tum to ye khyaal karate the ki ham tumhaare (dobaara paida karane ke) lie koee vakt hee na thaharaengen
